name: countOccurrences
description: Write a function to count occurrences of a value in an array
pyTest:
def test_count_occurrences(self):
        self.assertEqual(count_occurrences([1, 2, 3, 1, 4, 1], 1), 3)
        self.assertEqual(count_occurrences([1, 2, 3, 4, 5], 6), 0)
        self.assertEqual(count_occurrences([5, 5, 5, 5], 5), 4)
        self.assertEqual(count_occurrences([], 1), 0)
